pkgmetadata.longdescription: Siena - Simulation Investigation for Empirical Network Analysis // The main purpose of this package is to perform simulation- based estimation of stochastic actor-oriented models for longitudinal network data collected as panel data. Dependent variables can be single or multivariate networks, which can be directed, non-directed, or two-mode; and associated actor variables. There are also functions for testing parameters and checking goodness of fit. An overview of these models is given in Snijders (2017), doi:10.1146/annurev- statistics-060116-054035.
